column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " That 's everyone , our half of the train is clear . "
#Text=Varrick says : " That 's good , we 're almost out of time . "
#Text=Baatar Jr. says : " You 're insane . "
#Text=Varrick says : " You knew that when you hired me !
#Text=I got ta admit , you had me going there for a while , I really thought you were gon na blow us up !
#Text=Now , how do we turn this thing off ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Ooh , we ca n't turn it off .
#Text=We 're gon na blow up -- -- but , we had a pretty good run , right ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " What are you talking about , " a good run " ?
#Text=I 'm still running !
#Text=I like running !
#Text=" Varrick says : " I 'll see you on the other side , Zhu Li .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I want you to know , I hate you .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " I ca n't believe he actually blew himself up .
#Text=That man was crazier than a sewer pipe elephant - rat .
#Text=Let 's get back to Zaofu .
#Text="
